Ronnie, I am not dicking with you.

Replies.Reply: The code, did you get it?

"Yeah, he seemed like such a normal guy. Sure he kept to himself, but he was always nice to me." That's what they all say. That's what all the neighbors always say -- after the fact. Only after they've caught the guy, after he's killed thirty people --

him, I was so -- he's the one who left, he's the one who gave up, you know? -- But that's b.s. See, the truth is, my dad -- He saved me.

I'm sorry.   I thought you heard me...

We had it towed to Frank's.

I really am. You know, one thing I always told myself was that no matter what, I would always know what was going on with my kid --
Let me finish -- because I have to tell you something...

to find the edge of the foundering rail underneath.        Having at least some footing, Kale reaches back inside --

-- Because you lost him before maybe... you ever really knew him.

Whoa, whoa, settle down, slow down.

staggers to his feet and charges Kale. Kale grabs the bat, rolls around and swings up at Giles, WHACKING HIM IN THE CHEST.
